channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Balloon Barnyard
channel.desc: T? na bainbh ag iarraidh dul isteach i gcise?n an bhal?in the at? tar ?is lu? sa chl?s. (A hot-air balloon has arrived in the barnyard, and the piglets want to go in the basket.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Mecha Builders
channel.desc: T? teileasc?p Mhaor Nat tite go bun na haille. An mbeidh na cairde in ann cabhr? leis? (Ranger Nat's telescope has fallen to the bottom of a cliff. Can the Mechas help?).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Zou
channel.desc: Tugann Zou c?namh d? theaghlach ruda? a dh?anamh n?os sciobtha inniu. (Zou helps his family get their jobs done quickly today, however was he too quick?).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: PJ Masks
channel.desc: T? an Ninja O?che sa t?ir ar fh?inne ach meas t? an aimseoidh na mascanna ar dt?s ?? (Night Ninja and the ninjalinos stole the scroll and go to Mystery Mountain to get the ring.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Finny an Siorc
channel.desc: Briseann an teilif?s le linn an chl?ir is fearr le Finny agus le Muireann. (The TV breaks during Finny and Myrtle's favourite show, they make up what happens next.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Gus an Ridire Beag B?deach
channel.desc: T? Gus in ann gach rud a deir Warticious lena lucht lean?na, a chloiste?il lena liathr?id chriostail. (Warticious finds out she is being spied on by Gus.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Baile Beag Dra?ocht?il Pinocchio
channel.desc: Socra?onn Korat gurb ? Pinocchio an cara is fearr at? aige ? tharla ? f?in & Sionn?n ag troid. (When Korat & Sionn?n fight, Korat decides that Pinocchio is his new best friend.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Cat a' Hata
channel.desc: T? an oiread r?m?id ar Shail? agus ar Nic go bhfuil siad ag dul ag sc?t?il am?rach nach bhfuil siad in ann codladh! (Sally & Nick are so excited to go ice-skating tomorrow.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Cat a' Hata
channel.desc: N?l crann mailpe Shail? ag f?s go r?mhaith. Tugann an Cat na gas?ir chuig an Docht?ir Mac Cip?n lena fh?il amach c?n f?th. (Sally's little maple sapling hasn't grown any bigger!).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: C?la4
channel.desc: N?l aon easpa cl?racha do dhaoine ?ga ar C?la4 - b? ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in ?ineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with C?la4 - watch, play and learn.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Charlie agus Lola
channel.desc: B?onn Lola tr?na ch?ile nuair a chailltear luch Charlie ach faigheann siad luch nua. (Lola is upset when Charlie's pet mouse Nibbles dies, but then they get a new mouse.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Charlie agus Lola
channel.desc: T? Lola l?n le pisreoga agus creideann s? gach a deirtear l?i. (Lola is very superstitious, and believes everything that people tell her.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Charlie agus Lola
channel.desc: T? Lola ag glanadh amach a seomra mar n?l s? ag iarraidh go mbeadh s? chomh brocach is br?an le seomra Marty. (Lola is clearing out some of her old things.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Zak Jinks
channel.desc: Beidh neart spraoi ag Zak agus a chuid cairde ag an ionad camp?la. (Zak and his friends have loads of fun at the campsite.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: Zak Jinks
channel.desc: Tugann Saoirse Bundail?n, an coin?n br?ige, abhaile ?n scoil. (Saskia brings the pretend bunny, Plumpton home from school.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: That's Joey
channel.desc: T? grianghraf le t?g?il den rang ach n?l Olive ar scoil. (It's time to take the class photo, but Olive is out sick. Can Joey and Yassine delay the taking of the photo?).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: That's Joey
channel.desc: Caithfidh Joey scann?n a dh?anamh in ?ineacht le N?ir?n, an cail?n is c?thaile sa rang. (Joey has to make a film with the shyest girl in his class.).

channel.name: TG4 IE
channel.title: That's Joey
channel.desc: Is cos?il nach bhfuil cead ainmhithe a thabhairt ar scoil. (Olive's dog follows her to school.).
